Uses of Class
Machinuino.model.MooreMachine.Builder

  • Packages that use MooreMachine.Builder 
    Package Description
    Machinuino.model  

    • Uses of MooreMachine.Builder in Machinuino.model

      Methods in Machinuino.model that return MooreMachine.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MooreMachine.Builder MooreMachine.Builder.addInputPin(Pin inputPin)
      Adds a input Pin to the machine
      MooreMachine.Builder MooreMachine.Builder.addOutput(String state, Set<BoolPin> boolPins)
      Adds a output to this machine, preferably use this method after setting all the states and pins of the machine, as this method will check the set of states and pins before adding the output
      MooreMachine.Builder MooreMachine.Builder.addOutputPin(Pin outputPin)
      Adds a output Pin to the machine
      MooreMachine.Builder MooreMachine.Builder.addState(String state)
      Adds a state to the machine
      MooreMachine.Builder MooreMachine.Builder.addTransition(Transition transition)
      Adds a transition to the machine
      MooreMachine.Builder MooreMachine.Builder.initialState(String initialState)
      Sets the initial state of the machine, preferably use this method after setting all the states of the machine, as this method will check the set of states before setting the initial one
      MooreMachine.Builder MooreMachine.Builder.inputPins(Set<Pin> inputPins)
      Sets the input pins of the machine, preferably this method setting the pins should be the one of the first things to be done as setting the input pins enable setting the transitions
      MooreMachine.Builder MooreMachine.Builder.outputPins(Set<Pin> outputPins)
      Sets the output pins of the machine, preferably this method setting the pins should be the one of the first things to be done as setting the output pins enable setting the outputs
      MooreMachine.Builder MooreMachine.Builder.outputs(Set<Output> outputs)
      Sets the outputs of this machine, preferably use this method after setting all the states and pins of the machine, as this method will check the set of states and pins before setting the outputs
      MooreMachine.Builder MooreMachine.Builder.removeInputPin(Pin inputPin)
      Removes a input Pin from the machine
      MooreMachine.Builder MooreMachine.Builder.removeOutput(String state)
      Removes a output from this machine
      MooreMachine.Builder MooreMachine.Builder.removeOutputPin(Pin outputPin)
      Removes a output Pin from the machine
      MooreMachine.Builder MooreMachine.Builder.removeState(String state)
      Removes a state from the machine
      MooreMachine.Builder MooreMachine.Builder.removeTransition(Transition transition)
      Removes a transition from the machine
      MooreMachine.Builder MooreMachine.Builder.states(Set<String> states)
      Sets the states of the machine, preferably the states should be one of the first things to be set as they enable other attributes to be set.
      MooreMachine.Builder MooreMachine.Builder.transitions(Set<Transition> transitions) 
      Constructors in Machinuino.model with parameters of type MooreMachine.Builder 
      Constructor and Description
      Builder(MooreMachine.Builder builder)
